name: Slugma
flavorText:
It never sleeps.
It has to keep
moving because if it stopped, its
magma body would
cool and harden.

previous.name: Ursaring
previous.flavorText:
Although it is a
good climber, it
prefers to snap trees with its
forelegs and eat
fallen BERRIES.

next.name: Magcargo
next.flavorText:
The shell on its
back is just skin
that has cooled and hardened. It
breaks easily with
a slight touch.
